p: Histology (H&E) and immunohistochemistry was undertaken on formalin fixed, decalcified feet using an anti-CHIKV capsid monoclonal antibody as described [ 44]. Slides were scanned using Aperio AT Turbo (Aperio, Vista, CA) and analyzed using Aperio ImageScope software (v10) and the Positive Pixel Count v9 algorithm using default settings.
